item: Cellular dynamics of the skin, and mechanisms of keratinization

Skin rash (erythema, purpura, pigmented macules, papule, nodule, mass, blister, pustule, cysts, erosions, ulcers, telangiectasia, sclerosis, scarring, atrophy, scaling, crusting, lichenification, gangrene)
Skin testing (diascopy, dermographia (Darier’s sign), Nikolsky’s sign, Tzanck test, photosensitivity testing)
Allergy skin testing (skin prick test, skin injection test, patch test)
Microbiological testing (specimen collection method, skin lesion potassium hydroxide (KOH) exam)
